short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An easy to use and easy on the eyes serial terminal compatible with arduino and any other serial device.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This HTML5 based serial terminal makes use of Google Chrome's serial APIs to give you access to all of your serial ports on any OS. It works well with Arduino and similar prototyping platforms and all sorts of serial devices.

It brings together all of your platforms, linux, mac, windows and more so that you don't need to use multiple serial terminals depending on what computer you are on.
